goal.en: "Provide students with a general understanding of auditing research in the last several decades. The theories, research methodologies, and empirical findings underlying this area of studies will be illustrated. In addition, this course will discuss the role and implications of the auditing research for auditing practice."
goal.ch: 以會計審計知識與理論為核心，介紹相關的理論基礎，分析與資本市場有關的議題，且試圖用所學專業知識提供可能的解決方法與方案。
